other_tests.findings: The study is degraded by motion artifact. Mild platelike atelectasis in the lung bases. Normal hepatic morphology. Mild peribiliary edema noted. Mild hyperenhancement in segments 4B and 5 adjacent to the gallbladder fossa suggesting reactive changes. Gallbladder is distended with wall thickening suggesting inflammation; the wall is hyperintense on T2-weighted images with an irregular enhancement pattern, including many small nonenhancing foci along the inner wall. No gallstones noted.
